SweepShape< X > Class Template Reference

This template class is a shape that can be swept through a chunk space and collided with the obstacles therein. More...

Detailed Description

template<class X>
class SweepShape< X >

This template class is a shape that can be swept through a chunk space and collided with the obstacles therein.

The shape may be no bigger than GRID_RESOLUTION in any dimension.

The documentation for this class was generated from the following file:
  • chunk_space.cpp
